name: rce-ordinary - microscopic things (crosslinking mix) - splice

shape_0_per_frame2=y=.5+.3*sin(time+.067*q1+.037*q2);
shape_0_per_frame3=rad=sin(q1*.014+q2*.05)*.2;
shape_0_per_frame4=ang=time*1.5+q1*.05;
shape_0_per_frame5=
shape_0_per_frame6=r=.5+.5*sin(time*0.5+q1*.04+q2*.12);
shape_0_per_frame7=g=.5+.5*sin(time*0.5+q1*.05+q2*.11);
shape_0_per_frame8=b=.5+.5*sin(time*0.5+q1*.06+q2*.10);
shape_0_per_frame9=

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.500
shape_2_per_frame1=x=.5+.3*sin(time*1.1+.039*q1+.04*q2);
shape_2_per_frame2=y=.5+.3*sin(time*0.9+.024*q1+.04*q2);
shape_2_per_frame3=rad=sin(q1*.035+q2*.047)*.2;
shape_2_per_frame4=ang=time*2+q1*.1;
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=r=.5+.5*sin(time*0.5+q1*.03+q2*.17);
shape_2_per_frame7=g=.5+.5*sin(time*0.5+q1*.04+q2*.16);
shape_2_per_frame8=b=.5+.5*sin(time*0.5+q1*.05+q2*.15);
shape_2_per_frame9=
shape_2_per_frame10=sides=(q1*.41)%7;
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=num0=numbeat*(abs(num-num_att)+pump)+bnot(numbeat)*num0;
per_frame_2=pump=numbeat*(sin(t)*.1+.1)+bnot(numbeat)*pump;
per_frame_3=pump=pump*.98;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=num_b0=num_b;
per_frame_6=num=abs((bass-bass_att)+(mid-mid_att)+(treb-treb_att));
per_frame_7=num_att=num_att*.95+num*.05;
per_frame_8=num_b=above(num,1-pump)*above(abs(num-num_att),num0);
per_frame_9=numbeat=bnot(equal(num_b0,num_b));
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=t=t+num*.1;
per_frame_12=bc=bc+numbeat;
per_frame_13=num_effect=max(max(num,num_att)-1,0);
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=wave_a=0;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=ob_r=.5+.5*sin(.02*bc+.1*time+.05*t);
per_frame_18=ob_g=.5+.5*sin(.04*bc+.31*time+.05*t);
per_frame_19=ob_b=.5+.5*sin(.08*bc+.2*time+.05*t);
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=rot=1+.25*sin(t*0.14);
per_frame_22=cx=.5+.5*sin(t*.031);
per_frame_23=cy=.5+.5*sin(t*.028);
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=q1=t;
per_frame_26=q2=bc;
per_frame_27=q3=num_effect;
per_frame_28=q4=oq4+num_effect;
per_frame_29=oq4=q4;
per_pixel_1=rot=if(above(sin(q1*.04+q2*.13),0),rot,0.5+rad*.2*sin(.06*q1+.1*time));
per_pixel_2=sx=sx+sin(rad*1.57*sin(.21*q1+q2*.08)+y-0.5+q4)*.1;
per_pixel_3=sy=sy+sin(rad*1.57*sin(.11*q1+q2*.12)+x-0.5+q4)*.1;
per_pixel_4=zoom=zoom-.1*(1-rad);
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=dx=sin(y*3.14*sin(.12*q1+.09*q2+.2*q4))*(.1+.1*q3);
per_pixel_7=dy=sin(x*3.14*sin(.18*q1+.12*q2+.3*q4))*(.1+.1*q3)
warp_1=`sampler sampler_rand00;
warp_2=`sampler sampler_rand01;
warp_3=`shader_body
warp_4=`{
warp_5=`    // sample previous frame
warp_6=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz-GetBlur1(uv);
warp_7=`ret += (tex2D(sampler_rand00,uv)-tex2D(sampler_rand01,uv))*0.75;
warp_8=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_fw_cells;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`   uv*=0.5;
comp_5=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_6=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_main, uv+float2(0.5,0)).xyz);
comp_7=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_main, uv+float2(0,0.5)).xyz);
comp_8=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_main, uv+float2(0.5,0.5)).xyz);
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    float2 l=lum(ret);
comp_11=`    float sat=length(ret-l);
comp_12=`
comp_13=`    ret=lerp(lum(ret),ret,sat*32); //over-saturate
comp_14=`    ret=lerp(ret,tex2D(sampler_fw_cells,ret.xy*.4+.6),.15); //take stripes from image
comp_15=`    ret *= 1.80; //gamma
comp_16=`}
